text: a che ane je ko'i allahani pavitra vastuni ijajata karase, to tena potana mate allaha pase sresthata che. Ane tamara mate dhora halala kari devamam avya, te dhora sivaya, jenum varnana kari devamam avyum. Basa! Tamare murti'oni gandakithi bacine rahevum jo'i'e ane juththi vatathi pana bacavum jo'i'e
